price: Allah, faizi yok eder, sadakaları ise bereketlendirir. Allah, hiçbir günahkâr kafiri sevmez.
arabic: يَمۡحَقُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّبَوٰاْ وَيُرۡبِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yamḥaqu al-lahu al-riba wayur'bī al-ṣadaqāti wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu kulla kaffārin athīmin
